sections.description: Show the latest comments from Disqus (using API 3.0 and JSON).
sections.installation: Activate the plugin, insert the widget in your blog sidebar (or other place) and configure the required parameters following the informations available on the screen.
sections.changelog:
20/5/23

  • New: Hello GitHub! All informations about previous versions of the plugin are available at go.gioxx.org/disqus-recent-comments
